original_text: So I hope to visit you while I am travelling to Spain. I will stay with you in Rome for a short time. I will really enjoy having some time together with you there. Then you can help me to continue my journey. So I hope to visit you while I am travelling to Spain. I will stay with you in Rome for a short time. korean_text: 이는 지나가는 길에 너희를 보고 먼저 너희와 사귐으로 얼마간 기쁨을 가진 후에 너희가 그리로 보내주기를 바람이라

sentences.original_text: So I hope to visit you
while I am travelling to Spain
I will stay with you in Rome
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 로마에서 너희와 함께 머물 것입니다

sentences.original_text: having some time together with you there
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에서 너희와 함께 시간을 보내는 것을
그러면 너희는 나를 도울 수 있습니다
